text: <@U15HRTAHL>
When was the last time you wiped your Mac?
End of the semester. Why?
Mine is just about ready for another wipe. J curious if you recently had to.
I haven't used mine much tbh lol
Ah gotcha. lol Well if any of y’all need to provision your Macs ever, I made a script to install all the basics

```#!/bin/bash
VERSION="v0.0.1"

# Clean Mac setup
# 


# Check for Homebrew,
# Install if we don't have it

if test ! $(which brew); then
  echo "Installing homebrew..."
  ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL <https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install>)"
fi

# Update Homebrew Recipes
brew update

binaries=(
    node
    git
    python
)

echo "Installing binaries..."
brew install ${binaries[@]}

brew cleanup

echo "Installing Cask..."
brew install caskroom/cask

apps=(
    google-chrome
    slack
    spotify
    visual-studio-code
    vlc
)

#Install apps
echo "Installing apps..."
brew cask install ${apps[@]}


#Install fonts
fonts=(
    font-clear-sans
    font-roboto
)

echo "Installing fonts..."
brew cask install ${fonts[@]}```
I guess I should probably have that install Java as well…
It’s a work in progress as I prepare to wipe my Macbook lol
